lighten verb
(MAKE LESS HEAVY)

to make a difficult situation or responsibility easier: Getting a new assistant will lighten (= reduce) the workload considerably.

to make someone or become happier and less anxious: Being with friends lightened her mood.
lighten verb [T]
(MAKE NOT HEAVY)
to reduce the weight of something: He lost 30 pounds to lighten the burden on his knee.
To lighten is also to make an amount of work or a responsibility less heavy: To lighten the load, he decided to divide the job between two people. Phrasal verb
